name: Toy-Bohu
description:
Edouard fell asleep, a peaceful sleep in his room, night has just fallen, the storm is rumbling ardently outside, however the real war takes place inside the bedroom …

You are facing your worst enemy, the teddy bear nemesis who aspires to become Edward's favorite one.

The child sleeps peacefully while chaos starts just at the foot of his bed while he don't know it.

Macabre destiny that awaits one of the cuddly toys, you will have to play with the duality of light and shadow to achieve your goal.

Track down your enemy, anticipate their movement and identify their strengths and weaknesses.

Who will be Edouard's favorite teddy bear?

Who will have the highest place  ?

It's up to you to lead this battle to confront the infinitely small of this fight with an infinitely large victory !

THE TEAM :

3D ART :

Naomi ROY

Charline FAURE

PROGRAMMATION

Marion SAOUTER

Simon GIGANT

Nicolas LERAY

GAME & LEVEL DESIGN

ANNOUNCER VOICE

PROJECT MANAGEMENT
